memberdef.definition: std::vector<ext::shared_ptr<typename Traits::helper> > QuantLib::PiecewiseYoYInflationCurve< Interpolator, Bootstrap, Traits >::instruments_
memberdef.name: instruments_

detaileddescription.para: This method must be implemented in derived classes. An instance of Observer does not call this method directly: instead, it will be called by the observables the instance registered with when they need to notify any changes.
This method must implement any calculations which must be (re)done in order to calculate the desired results.

briefdescription.para: to be defined in derived classes

memberdef.argsstring: (const Date &referenceDate, Date baseDate, Rate baseYoYRate, Frequency frequency, const DayCounter &dayCounter, std::vector< ext::shared_ptr< typename Traits::helper > > instruments, const ext::shared_ptr< Seasonality > &seasonality={}, Real accuracy=1.0e-12, const Interpolator &i=Interpolator())
memberdef.name: PiecewiseYoYInflationCurve

memberdef.argsstring: (const Date &referenceDate, Date baseDate, Rate baseYoYRate, Frequency frequency, bool indexIsInterpolated, const DayCounter &dayCounter, std::vector< ext::shared_ptr< typename Traits::helper > > instruments, const ext::shared_ptr< Seasonality > &seasonality={}, Real accuracy=1.0e-12, const Interpolator &i=Interpolator())
memberdef.name: PiecewiseYoYInflationCurve

xrefdescription.para: Use the overload without indexIsInterpolated. Deprecated in version 1.37.

memberdef.argsstring: (const Date &referenceDate, const Calendar &calendar, const DayCounter &dayCounter, const Period &lag, Frequency frequency, bool indexIsInterpolated, Rate baseYoYRate, std::vector< ext::shared_ptr< typename Traits::helper > > instruments, Real accuracy=1.0e-12, const Interpolator &i=Interpolator())
memberdef.name: PiecewiseYoYInflationCurve

xrefdescription.para: Use the overload without lag and indexIsInterpolated and pass the base date as the first date in the vector. Deprecated in version 1.34.

detaileddescription.para: The last date for which we have information.
When not set directly (the recommended option), it is calculated base on an observation lag relative to today.

briefdescription.para: the latest date for which the curve can return values
